Sc. 7/8 15c 28th ---- ---- Cu. 5/8 15c {Cloud.= Cloud type in standard Met. - {code and cloud cover in oktas. {Soil. = Ground temperature at 30cm. {Considerable diurnal variation in wind {speed noted during this period. { } Ye olde Millfield Weather Rhyme A Doomesday Project brought forth rain A field trip brings heavy rain, A Doomesday Survey brings the{MONSOON! { Anon.
